verses.text: Now \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* was \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \add and\add* \w stricken|strong="H0935"\w* in \w years|strong="H3117"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou art \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \add and\add* \w stricken|strong="H0935"\w* in \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, and there \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w* yet \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to be \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w*.\f + \fr 13.1 \ft to…: Heb. to possess it\f*

This \add is\add* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that yet \w remaineth|strong="H7604"\w*: all the \w borders|strong="H1552"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and all \w Geshuri|strong="H1651"\w*,

From \w Sihor|strong="H7883"\w*, which \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, even unto the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w* \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*, \add which\add* is \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* to the \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w*: \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*; the \w Gazathites|strong="H5841"\w*, and the \w Ashdothites|strong="H0796"\w*, the \w Eshkalonites|strong="H0832"\w*, the \w Gittites|strong="H1663"\w*, and the \w Ekronites|strong="H6139"\w*; also the \w Avites|strong="H5761"\w*:

From the \w south|strong="H8486"\w*, all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and \w Mearah|strong="H4632"\w* that \add is\add* beside the \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, unto \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*, to the \w borders|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*:\f + \fr 13.4 \ft Mearah: or, the cave\f*

And the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Giblites|strong="H1382"\w*, and all \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*, from \w Baal-gad|strong="H1171"\w* under \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w* unto the \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*.

All the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the hill \w country|strong="H2022"\w* from \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* unto \w Misrephoth-maim|strong="H4956"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, them will I drive \w out|strong="H3423"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: only divide thou it by \w lot|strong="H5307"\w* unto the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee.

Now therefore \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* this \w land|strong="H0776"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* unto the \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, and the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*,

With whom the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* and the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w* have \w received|strong="H3947"\w* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them, \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*, \add even\add* as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them;

From \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, that \add is\add* upon the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, and all the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* of \w Medeba|strong="H4311"\w* unto \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*;

And all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*;

And \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w Geshurites|strong="H1651"\w* and \w Maachathites|strong="H4602"\w*, and all \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hermon|strong="H2768"\w*, and all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* unto \w Salcah|strong="H5548"\w*;

All the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, which \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w* and in \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*, who \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w giants|strong="H7497"\w*: for these did \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w smite|strong="H5221"\w*, and cast them \w out|strong="H3423"\w*.

Nevertheless the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w expelled|strong="H3423"\w* not the \w Geshurites|strong="H1651"\w*, nor the \w Maachathites|strong="H4602"\w*: but the \w Geshurites|strong="H1650"\w* and the \w Maachathites|strong="H4601"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* until this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Only unto the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* none \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*; the \w sacrifices|strong="H0801"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* \add are\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* \add inheritance\add* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And their \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* was from \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, that \add is\add* on the \w bank|strong="H8193"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w* \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w river|strong="H5158"\w*, and all the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w* by \w Medeba|strong="H4311"\w*;

\w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, and all her \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that \add are\add* in the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*; \w Dibon|strong="H1769"\w*, and \w Bamoth-baal|strong="H1120"\w*, and \w Beth-baal-meon|strong="H1010"\w*,\f + \fr 13.17 \ft Bamoth-baal…: or, the high places of Baal, and house of Baal-meon\f*
And \w Jahazah|strong="H3096"\w*, and \w Kedemoth|strong="H6932"\w*, and \w Mephaath|strong="H4158"\w*,
And \w Kirjathaim|strong="H7156"\w*, and \w Sibmah|strong="H7643"\w*, and \w Zareth-shahar|strong="H6890"\w* in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*,
And \w Beth-peor|strong="H1047"\w*, and \w Ashdoth-pisgah|strong="H0798"\w*, and \w Beth-jeshimoth|strong="H1020"\w*,\f + \fr 13.20 \ft Ashdoth-pisgah: or, springs of Pisgah, or, the hill\f*

And all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, and all the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, which \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* with the \w princes|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, \w Evi|strong="H0189"\w*, and \w Rekem|strong="H7552"\w*, and \w Zur|strong="H6698"\w*, and \w Hur|strong="H2354"\w*, and \w Reba|strong="H7254"\w*, \add which were\add* \w dukes|strong="H5257"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w*, \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* also the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w*, the \w soothsayer|strong="H7080"\w*, did the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* among \w them|strong="H0413"\w* that were \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by them.\f + \fr 13.22 \ft soothsayer: or, diviner\f*

And the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* was \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, and the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* \add thereof\add*. This \add was\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* and the \w villages|strong="H2691"\w* thereof.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add inheritance\add* unto the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And their \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* was \w Jazer|strong="H3270"\w*, and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, unto \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*;

And from \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w* unto \w Ramath-mizpeh|strong="H7434"\w*, and \w Betonim|strong="H0993"\w*; and from \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w* unto the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Debir|strong="H1688"\w*;

And in the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \w Beth-aram|strong="H1027"\w*, and \w Beth-nimrah|strong="H1039"\w*, and \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, and \w Zaphon|strong="H6829"\w*, the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* and \add his\add* \w border|strong="H1366"\w*, \add even\add* unto the \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Chinnereth|strong="H3672"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*.

This \add is\add* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and their \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add inheritance\add* unto the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: and \add this\add* was \add the possession\add* of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And their \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* was from \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w*, all \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, all the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, and all the \w towns|strong="H2333"\w* of \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w*, which \add are\add* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*:

And \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, and \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w*, and \w Edrei|strong="H0154"\w*, \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* in \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \add were pertaining\add* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \add even\add* to the one \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* by their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

These \add are the countries\add* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* did distribute for \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, by \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w eastward|strong="H4217"\w*.

But unto the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* not \add any\add* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, as he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto them.
